resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

fields.description:
Description:
With a few steps, it's possible to get the appcelerator media controls to appear partially behind the tab bar.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KitchenSink on Verizon iPhone
2) Navigate to Phone>Play Movie>Local
3) play the movie.
4) enter fullscreen playback
5) Rotate to landscape
6) rotate to portrait
7) Return from fullscreen playback

Result:
Media controls partially behind tab bar

Expected Result:
Media controls fully visible

Notes:
Could not reproduce on 1.6.2 because test does not allow orientation change
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink Phone>Play Movie>Local can have appcelerator media control bar partially obscured by tab bar
fields.environment: Verizon iPhone 4 (4.2.6) , Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105131803, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X r3ecace11

comments.body: Couldn't reproduce on 1.7 because the test doesn't allow orientation change, either. We need to powow.
